meanings.definition: To speak or write at length or in detail.

meanings.sent2: He always expatiates when telling a story.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, he couldn't help but expatiate on unrelated topics.

meanings.sent1: The professor expatiated on the importance of research in his field.
meanings.sent2: She tends to expatiate on historical events during her lectures.
